text: Tank Johnson is a defensive tackle in the NFL for the Cincinnati Bengals. He is #99 and he is 27 years old. He went to Washington for college. He was born in Chandler, Arizona. He is 6'3" and weighs 305 lbs. He has 10 tackles on the season of 2009. He was born on December 7, 1981. He has been in the NFL for 6 years. ==Other websites== *Tank Johnson at cincinnatibengals.com Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Cincinnati Bengals players Category:Dallas Cowboys players
title: Tank Johnson
